thread.title: Marquette King punted a birthday cake for Derek Carr
thread.title_full: Marquette King punted a birthday cake for Derek Carr

author: Hector Diaz
title: Marquette King punted a birthday cake for Derek Carr
text:
Happy birthday, Derek Carr! 
Happy B day @derekcarrqb pic.twitter.com/JH6RFsqfsW 
— Marquette King (@MarquetteKing) March 29, 2017 Oakland Raiders Marquette King is our favorite punter for many reasons. For one, he likes to practice in a Power Rangers costume from time to time. This time, he’s still punting and he’s in his typical practice gear, but he doesn’t have a football. 
For Oakland quarterback Derek Carr’s birthday, King punted a damn cake and posted it on Twitter. You can argue that this is a waste of good cake, but sometimes those RTs are as delicious as birthday cake. 
If you try this, it can work both ways: You can treat this as a fun way of telling a friend happy birthday. But if you’re mad at them, you can also kick a birthday cake. That way, you can express your frustration while still caring for a good friend. Thank you for innovating the birthday gram game, Marquette.
